special_text:
Lands enter tapped.
[+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 and has “Whenever this creature deals excess combat damage to one or more permanents, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.”
[-2]: Ajani deals 3 damage to any target. You gain life equal to excess damage dealt this way.
